projects.name: Accessibility Quiz
projects.description: An online quiz built with accessibility in mind. The design is responsive and follows best accessibility practices

projects.name: Recipe Lib
projects.description: A web app that fetches and displays data dynamically from a recipes API. The project features filtering and sorting functionalities that work in tandem, giving the user the ability to fine-tune their search results.

projects.name: Chadō Business Site
projects.description: A basic business site built using HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript with responsiveness in mind.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A weather app built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and TypeScript. The app uses the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch weather data and displays it in a user-friendly interface.
